title: Birth a Basket
lyrics:
Chop your wood
And weave a nest from sticks
O let the cold in
Let's weave a little house
Out of dreams

Blow and blow

But it'll keep on standing

Huff and puff in vain



Let's grow a basket

All covered in thorns

When harvest time comes by round

We'll feast until dawn



Blow and blow

But it'll keep on standing

Huff and puff in vain



Let's thatch a roof

But leave a holes

So we can let the stars in

So they'll forever shine down on me



Blow and blow

But it'll keep on standing

Huff and puff in vain
